solution_line_template: The small panda bears eat a total of {num_small_pandas} x {small_panda_daily} = <<{num_small_pandas}*{small_panda_daily}={small_total_daily}>>{small_total_daily} pounds of bamboo every day.
The bigger panda bears eat a total of {num_big_pandas} x {big_panda_daily} = <<{num_big_pandas}*{big_panda_daily}={big_total_daily}>>{big_total_daily} pounds of bamboo every day.
So, the 9 pandas eat a total of {small_total_daily} + {big_total_daily} = <<{small_total_daily}+{big_total_daily}={total_daily}>>{total_daily} pounds of bamboo every day.
Therefore, they eat a total of {total_daily} x {days_in_week} = <<{total_daily}*{days_in_week}={total_weekly}>>{total_weekly} pounds in a week.
